ygData.subject: Re: Roll Call
ygData.msgSnippet: ... yeah, neriak is great that way, and I ve *never* had to wait to use the wheel. the only problem: nearest sketches are 6 zones away. Nakano K shynn Priest
ygData.messageBody:
>
> From: Hans Buchheim <hans.buchheim@...>
>
> Kelethin is ok, but Caladium Rocks!! Buy a back pack full of sketches in Kelethin
> and run to Kaladim (there are no sketches in Kaladim). You can run from the potting
> wheel to the vender who sells clay faster than you can run accross a single platform
> in Kelethin... I hear Neriak and Halas have similar arrangements...
>

yeah, neriak is great that way, and I've *never* had to wait to use the
wheel. the only problem: nearest sketches are 6 zones away.

Nakano K'shynn
Priest of Innoruuk and Evil baker
Iron League
